languages.text: Applies +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.

traits.locale_text: Applies +1 stack of the shadow quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing Strength, Agility, Toughness, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.

Applies +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.

Applies +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.

languages.text: 对敌人施加1层“阴影区疫病”效果，使所有变种人盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}提高7点。
languages.original_text: Applies +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.

traits.locale_text: 对敌人施加1层“阴影区疫病”效果，使所有变种人盟友的力量、敏捷、坚韧与{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}提高7点。

languages.text: Накладывает на противников +1 уровень эффекта "болезнь теневых кварталов", повышая значения {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} союзных мутантов на 7.
languages.original_text: Applies +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.

traits.locale_text: Накладывает на противников +1 уровень эффекта "болезнь теневых кварталов", повышая значения Силы, Ловкости, Выносливости и {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} союзных мутантов на 7.
Накладывает на противников +1 уровень эффекта "болезнь теневых кварталов", повышая значения Силы, Ловкости, Выносливости и {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} союзных мутантов на 7.

languages.text: 敵にシャドウ・クォーター病の効果を+1スタック与え、味方の変異体の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、と{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を+7増加させる。
languages.original_text: Applies +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.

traits.locale_text: 敵に影地区病の効果を1スタック与え、味方の変異体の腕力、敏捷性、耐久力、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を7増加させる。

languages.text: Aplica 1 acumulación del efecto Enfermedad de los barrios bajos a los enemigos y aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de los mutantes aliados en +7.
languages.original_text: Applies +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.

traits.locale_text: Aplica 1 acumulación del efecto Enfermedad de los barrios bajos a los enemigos y aumenta la Fuerza, la Agilidad, la Resistencia y las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de los mutantes aliados en +7.

languages.text: Verursacht bei Feinden +1 Stapel "Krankheit der Schattenquartiere" und erhöht {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verbündeter Mutanten um +7.
languages.original_text: Applies +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.

traits.locale_text: Verursacht bei Feinden +1 Stapel des Effekts Krankheit der Schattenquartiere und erhöht gleichzeitig Stärke, Beweglichkeit, Zähigkeit und {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verbündeter Mutanten um +7.

languages.text: Inflige +1 cumul de l'effet Maladie du Quartier des Ombres aux ennemis et augmente de +7 la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} des mutants alliés.
languages.original_text: Applies +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.

traits.locale_text: Inflige +1 cumul de l'effet Maladie des Quartiers des Ombres aux ennemis et augmente de +7 la Force, l'Agilité, la Résistance et les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} des mutants alliés.

languages.text: Düşmanlarda +1 Gölge Mahalli hastalığı etkisi birikimi oluştururken dost mutantların {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} nitelikleri ve {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanları +7 artar.
languages.original_text: Applies +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect on enemies, while increasing {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of allied mutants by +7.
